description: PR files are created by version 3 of Source Insight to store projects. When you save a project as a PR file in Source Insight 3 the PR file is stored in the following directory:

The PR file format was replaced by the SIPROJ file format in version 4 of Source Insight. However, you can still open PR projects in version 4 of Source Insight by selecting Project → Open Project... . The project is saved in the new SIPROJ format while the original PR file remains unedited.
